findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.21 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.21 (0x00c7221d5fbdaab1448675a156876efb885a6449.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: Contract DENMARK_WINS (0x00c7221d5fbdaab1448675a156876efb885a6449.sol#3-56) is not in CapWords
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message: Function DENMARK_WINS.SimpleERC20Token() (0x00c7221d5fbdaab1448675a156876efb885a6449.sol#15-18) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message:
DENMARK_WINS.slitherConstructorVariables() (0x00c7221d5fbdaab1448675a156876efb885a6449.sol#3-56) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 1165947079929830000000000000 (0x00c7221d5fbdaab1448675a156876efb885a6449.sol#11)
findings.name: too-many-digits
